summary: Bimal is a taxi-driver in a small town. His taxi is his only companion and, although very battered, it is the apple of Bimal's eye. The film shows the love of taxi driver Bimal and his pathetic vehicle Jagaddal.
cast: Kali Bannerjee|Gangapada Basu|Satindra Bhattacharya|Tulsi Chakraborty|Anil Chatterjee|Shriman Deepak|Kajal Gupta|Gyanesh Mukherjee|Keshto Mukherjee|Sita Mukherjee
title: Ajantrik
